Plot: Charlie's brother, Sam dies in a car crash that Charlie survives. Charlie is given the gift of seeing his dead brother but when the girl he fell in love with's life is at risk he must choose between his girlfriend and his brother.
Title: Charlie St. Cloud
Writer: Craig Pearce (screenplay), Lewis Colick (screenplay), Ben Sherwood (novel)
Actors: Zac Efron, Charlie Tahan, Amanda Crew, Augustus Prew
tomatoConsensus: Zac Efron gives it his all, but Charlie St. Cloud is too shallow and cloying to offer much more than eye candy for his fans.
